blocks.title: Blogs
blocks.text: Interesting topics, stories, and guides on IT, development, web design, freelancing, and more.

blocks.title: Overview
blocks.subtitle: A List
blocks.text: Blogs labeled 'dev' are specifically for web developers and designers. These blogs delve into technical concepts and are often filled with jargon that may be incomprehensible to the average user.
